title: A clip from a movie, ‘The Flu’, is being falsely shared as ‘Situation in Italy’
subtitle: The video is not of a real-life incident and it is also not related to the current COVID-19 outbreak in Italy. It is a clip from a 2013 movie - ‘The Flu’.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of dead bodies being lifted by a crane and then thrown into a mass grave is being shared as the situation in Italy. FACTLY has found that the video is not of a real-life incident and it is not related to the current COVID-19 outbreak in Italy. The video clip is part of a 2013 movie – ‘The Flu’. In the movie, the visuals in the clip can be seen between 1:07:04 and 1:07:12.

Did you watch our new video?
